name: webdb-iv-guided
description: - clone the [starter code](https://github.com/LambdaSchool/webapi-iii-guided). - create a solution branch: `git checkout -b solution`. - add this repository as a remote: `git remote add solution https://github.com/LambdaSchool/webapi-iii-guided-solution` - pull from this repository's `master` branch into the `solution` branch in your local folder `git pull solution master:solution --force`.
